apis.description:
Returns the list of SIS import errors for an account or a SIS import. Import
errors are only stored for 30 days.

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_imports/<id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

operations.notes:
Returns the list of SIS import errors for an account or a SIS import. Import
errors are only stored for 30 days.

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_imports/<id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

parameters.name: failure
parameters.description: If set, only shows errors on a sis import that would cause a failure.

apis.description:
Returns the list of SIS import errors for an account or a SIS import. Import
errors are only stored for 30 days.

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_imports/<id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

operations.notes:
Returns the list of SIS import errors for an account or a SIS import. Import
errors are only stored for 30 days.

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_imports/<id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

Example:
  curl 'https://<canvas>/api/v1/accounts/<account_id>/sis_import_errors' \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>"

parameters.name: failure
parameters.description: If set, only shows errors on a sis import that would cause a failure.

sis_import_id.description: The unique identifier for the SIS import.

file.description: The file where the error message occurred.

message.description: The error message that from the record.
message.example: No short_name given for course C001

row_info.description: The contents of the line that had the error.

row.description: The line number where the error occurred. Some Importers do not yet support this. This is a 1 based index starting with the header row.
